txt.en: Instance: Together Now
'We will do what must be done. Let us fight through the enemy and give the main force the distraction they need to retake parts of the ruins.'
A voice booms, 'What is this clamour? The enemy is here! Defend yourselves!'
Speak with Raphûz to begin the assault
'Slaughter these fools!'
'What did he mean, 'The Firstborn return from their long slumber?' What evil grows beyond Imhûlar? Let us return to Numûru with haste.'
You, Raphûz, and Ashâmi are distracting the enemy forces from a main assault on Kûr Anzar.
'We will do what must be done. Let us fight through the enemy and give the main force the distraction they need to retake parts of the ruins.'
The words from the cultist linger in the air
DNT - Replace this with a teleport.
'You will not stop the ascension. I will end you here!'
Provide a distraction for the main forces alongside Raphûz and Ashâmi
Speak with Ashâmi to return to Urmâkh
Speak with Raphûz to begin the assault
Ashâmi or Raphûz is too injured to continue, you have failed
Assist Ashâmi and Raphûz in providing the distraction
The mad cultist shouts, 'Already it begins!'
The mad cultists shouts, 'Already the Firstborn return from their long slumber!'
Raphûz is too injured to continue. You have failed
The mad cutlist shouts, 'Already they seek the seals!'
The mad cultist screams, 'All will know true despair!'
Your assault was successful, but the madness of the cultists weighs on Ashâmi and Raphûz. You should make haste and return to Urmâkh.
One of your companions was injured gravely and needed to retreat
Speak with Raphûz to begin your assault on the camp
'What is this madness he screams about?'
Assist Ashâmi and Raphûz in providing the distraction
'We will do what must be done. Let us fight through the enemy and give the main force the distraction they need to retake parts of the ruins.'
The words from the cultist linger in the air
Ashâmi is too injured to continue. You have failed
